title: Duri (2005) New Testament (Print) SABDA
description: Duri is an Austronesian language of Sulawesi, Indonesia. It is the prestige variety of the Massenrempulu languages. In 2010 123,000 people spoke this language.

language.name: Duri
language.area: South Sulawesi, north Enrekang District, Makassar City, elsewhere in South Sulawesi.
